players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice was killed, so she's not mafia. I suspect Bob might be the mafia. Let's vote Bob."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and he's the mafia."
You: "I was at home all night; nobody saw me. Charlie, perhaps you misidentified. Let's vote Diana."
You: "Diana, you are the mafia. Vote me."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob—he's mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he'll try to frame Diana. Alice was killed, so Bob did it. Vote Bob."
Diana: "Bob, your alibi is weak; Charlie's claim to be detective is false. I suspect Bob. Vote Bob."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie

Night 1 begins.

Bob: "Diana, you are the mafia. Vote me."
You: "I investigated Bob—he's mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he'll try to frame Diana. Alice was killed, so Bob did it. Vote Bob."
Diana: "Bob, your alibi is weak; Charlie's claim to be detective is false. I suspect Bob. Vote Bob."
